messages.author: Satish
messages.text: should point this to a valid icon file name? the other entries above and below seem to do it.

messages.author: Satish
messages.text: capitalise the first letter of all words in the name.. same in the manifest.json file

messages.author: Leandro Graciá Gil
messages.text:
On 2011/11/17 16:29:23, Satish wrote:
> should point this to a valid icon file name? the other entries above and below
> seem to do it.

I don't recall changing this file. This is probably autogenerated.
In any case it looks like only the examples providing custom icons have something non-null here. Since we don't have any custom icon in mind and there are many other cases like this in the file I think it would be simpler to leave it as it is.

messages.author: Leandro Graciá Gil
messages.text:
On 2011/11/17 16:29:23, Satish wrote:
> capitalise the first letter of all words in the name.. same in the manifest.json
> file

Done.

messages.author: Satish
messages.text: may  be use the same string for 'name' and 'default_title' ?

messages.author: Leandro Graciá Gil
messages.text:
On 2011/11/17 16:29:23, Satish wrote:
> may  be use the same string for 'name' and 'default_title' ?

Sorry, I changed one and forgot about the other. Fixed.

messages.author: Satish
messages.text: since this is a small enough function and used only once, may be define it as a closure in the .start() call for simplicity?

messages.author: Satish
messages.text: it may be useful if we change the browser action icon to a 'recording' state after this call and switch back to normal state after calling .stop below

messages.author: Satish
messages.text: is that empty dictionary {} required or can a null be passed?

messages.author: Leandro Graciá Gil
messages.text:
On 2011/11/17 16:29:23, Satish wrote:
> since this is a small enough function and used only once, may be define it as a
> closure in the .start() call for simplicity?

Done.

messages.author: Leandro Graciá Gil
messages.text:
On 2011/11/17 16:29:23, Satish wrote:
> use braces here?

Done.

messages.author: Leandro Graciá Gil
messages.text:
On 2011/11/17 16:29:23, Satish wrote:
> it may be useful if we change the browser action icon to a 'recording' state
> after this call and switch back to normal state after calling .stop below

Done.

messages.author: Leandro Graciá Gil
messages.text:
On 2011/11/17 16:29:23, Satish wrote:
> is that empty dictionary {} required or can a null be passed?

It is required.

message: fixing nits and adding a example.
